name: Sportals - level 1
description:
w, a, s, d or arrow keys to move,

left click to shoot or place blue portal

right click to place red portal

1, 2 and 3 or scroll wheel to changes guns

mouse to aim

This was a piece of coursework, i wanted to recreate the portal gun from portal 2, I was able to make the gun and portal work but not like the actual portal gun,
